name: Carton
description: Enter into the universe of cardboard, the ground, grass, trees, characters, everything is cardboard ! Make and explore your continent for finding a place where you can build your town. Survive of seasons and the night attack of goblins. Create a warrior group and assault the goblin castle !
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, Windows Seven, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Double core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or Nvidia 512 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista, Windows Seven, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or Nvidia 2 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
